subcategory_lists.title: Industrial Robots and Automation.
subcategory_lists.description: These are companies that provide robots and robotic automation products and services with a focus on industrial applications.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 산업용 로봇 및 로봇 자동화 제품과 서비스를 제공하는 기업들입니다.

subcategory_lists.title: Unmanned Vehicles and Drones.
subcategory_lists.description: These are companies that are involved in the development and production of unmanned vehicles (including hardware and software for autonomous cars), drones and robots for both military and consumer markets.
subcategory_lists.title_kr: 무인 차량 및 드론. (Unmanned vehicles and drones.)
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 무인차, 드론, 로봇 개발 및 생산에 참여하는 기업들입니다. (무인차, 드론, 로봇 개발 및 생산)

subcategory_lists.title: Non-industrial Robotics
subcategory_lists.description: These are companies that are involved in developing robots and AI that are used for non-industrial applications, including but not limited to agriculture, healthcare, consumer applications and entertainment.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 비산업용 로봇 및 인공지능 개발에 관여하는 기업들, 농업, 의료, 소비자용 애플리케이션, 엔터테인먼트 등에서 사용되는 기술.

subcategory_lists.title: Artificial Intelligence
subcategory_lists.description: These are companies that develop or directly deliver Artificial Intelligence in form of products, software, or systems. These companies should sell Artificial Intelligence and not utilize/leverage it to enhance their products.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 인공지능 제품, 소프트웨어, 시스템을 개발하거나 직접 제공하는 기업들을 투자하고 있습니다. 인공지능을 판매하는 기업에 중점을 두고 있으며, 제품 강화를 위해 인공지능을 활용하는 기업은 배제하고 있습니다.
